message.content:
cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.HC. 

The paper focuses on a system that supports video editing through interactive transcripts, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval techniques (cs.MM, cs.IR). The system also includes a recommendation system based on expert-annotated data, which involves machine learning and data mining techniques (cs.CL). The use of B-roll in video production is closely related to visual content analysis and processing (cs.CV), and the evaluation of the system involves a user study, which falls under human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
